text: Claude-Louis Navier (born Claude Louis Marie Henri Navier; ; 10 February 1785 – 21 August 1836), was a French engineer, mathematician and physicist. His works were based in continuum mechanics. The Navier–Stokes equations are named after him and George Gabriel Stokes. Category:1785 births Category:1836 deaths Category:French physicists Category:French mechanical engineers Category:French mathematicians
title: Claude-Louis Navier
